# TCControlContents.DpadElementStyle

**Enumeration**

Defines the visual style of the individual up/down/left/right elements of a direction pad.

## Declaration

```swift
enum DpadElementStyle
```

## Styles

- **TCControlContents.DpadElementStyle.circle**: A circular direction pad style.
- **TCControlContents.DpadElementStyle.pentagon**: A pentagon direction pad style.

## Creating an element style

- **init(rawValue:)**

## System content

- **TCControlContents.ButtonShape**: Defines the visual shape of a button.
- **TCControlContents.DpadDirection**: Defines the direction of a direction pad visual.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
